name: Farming Terminator 🌼💣
description:
Damn, real estate agents want your field to build ugly buildings. 😡 But you want to save your precious flowers because fuck them ! 🌼

A farming simulator + Shoot them up game !

Somes advices !

🎃 Pumpkins are really useful to create barriers 

🥔 You should grow potatoes every time you can do it

🍉 Don't forget the watermelons

It's okay do die quickly the first try ;)

👩‍💻👩‍💻 A game by Tieffeline and Menica Folden 🇫🇷 Made in 2 days for the Mix and Game Jam
